li.label: Caste Shearl
li.description: The shearls as other fimirs are drawn to the mearghs.

li.label: Caste Fimm
li.description: The fimms are trained to be able to kill with any weapon up close. As other fimirs the fimms are drawn to the mearghs.

li.label: Caste Dirach
li.description: A faint unnatural fog can protect the Dirach against strikes. As other fimirs the dirachs are drawn to the mearghs.

li.label: Caste Meargh
li.description: Born to rule, they have a hatred and disdain for other mearghs who can threaten their rule. A unnatural fog protects the Meargh agains brutes trying to strike them down.
